snippet: An interview with Rachel Chavkin about "Mission Drift," the latest work from the New York-based theater company the TEAM.
abstract: An interview with Rachel Chavkin about "Mission Drift," the latest work from the New York-based theater company the TEAM.
lead_paragraph: Rock music, Dutch teenagers, global financial turmoil, the best and worst of Las Vegas: all of it takes the stage in "Mission Drift," by the New York-based theater company the TEAM (Theater of the Emerging American Moment). The piece comes to New York as part of this year's Coil Festival after winning several awards at last year's Edinburgh Festival Fringe.

keywords.value: Theater of the Emerging American Moment
